xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: rendering.macro.locationSearch.name=Location search rendering.macro.locationSearch.description=Search in the given location. rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.reference.name=Reference rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.reference.description=The reference of the location to search into. Use "WebHome" to search in children of the current document, "" to search everywhere. rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.box.name=Box rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.box.description=Display the search bar in a box. rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.float.name=Float rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.float.description=Make the search block float. rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.buttonText.name=Button text rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.buttonText.description=Text displayed on the button. rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.tags.name=Tags rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.tags.description=The search should be restricted to documents containing one of these tags, separated with a pipe character (|). rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.className.name=Class name rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.className.description=The search should be restricted to documents containing an object of this class. rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.kind.name=Kind rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.kind.description=The search should be restricted to this kind of elements (possible values: title, content, comment, attachment, attachmentName, attachmentContent, object, all; default: all). rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.suggest.name=Suggest rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.suggest.description=Suggest results as the search is typed. rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.showExcerpts.name=Show Excerpts rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.showExcerpts.description=Show exceprts with highlighted matches in suggested results. rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.width.name=Width rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.width.description=Width of the search box. rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.inputWidth.name=Input width rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.inputWidth.description=Width of the search input. rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.buttonWidth.name=Button width rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.buttonWidth.description=Width of the search button. rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.description.name=Description rendering.macro.locationSearch.parameter.description.description=Description of the search box.
